    • Constructor Detail

      • Facilities

        public Facilities​(int ID,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  double price,
                  java.lang.String endDecomDate)
        This method creates the object of the facility. It has an ID number, a name, a price and a decommission status. There is also set and get methods for each factor needed.

      • scanFacilities

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Facilities> scanFacilities​()
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method goes through the facilities text file and stores the data in an object array list which it then returns.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getFacNames

        public static java.lang.String[] getFacNames​()
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        getFacNames goes through a array list of the facilities. It then stores the all the names of the facilities in a one dimensional array. It then returns that array with all the facility names.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findIDInArray

        public static int findIDInArray​(java.lang.String[] array,
                                java.lang.String choice)
        findIDInArray method is passed a one dimensional array and a string. The method goes through the array looking for String. It then stores the position where is found the string and returns it.
